entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 01:01 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 5.5°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except northeast 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to rain near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
